participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Frustrated and determined, Michael feels trapped in his current circumstances but is seeking a way out.
participant_1.background: my wife spends all my money. i'm 40 years old. i am planning on getting a divorce. i hate my job.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and optimistic, Emily finds joy in music and is driven by her dreams of becoming a successful musician.
participant_2.background: i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills. i play the piano and guitar and sing. my favorite type of music to sing is folk music. i'm a musician and hope to make it big some day.
